Title: Lagos govt urges doctors to shelve three-day warning strike
Summary: Lagos govt urges doctors to shelve three-day warning strike . Lagos State Government appealed to medical doctors under its employment to suspend their planned strike . The Lagos state government has appealed to medics to suspend the planned strike, which is due to last three days .

Title: Abiodun, Uzodimma, Musawa, Odeh hail Super Falcons’ WAFCON triumph
Summary: Nigeria beat Morocco 3-2 to clinch their 10th Women’s Africa Cup of Nations title . Super Falcons defeated host nation Morocco 3–2 in Rabat on Saturday . Nigeria is basking in the glow of a remarkable sporting achievement as the Super Falcons delivered a stunning comeback .

Title: Oak Heirs acquires 87% stake in Air Liquide Nigeria
Summary: Oak Heirs Limited, an investment holding company led by Nigerian businessman Gbotemi Kuti, has acquired an 87.31% stake in Air Liquide Nigeria . The investment company is led by Gbotem Kuti .

Title: WAFCON: Otti hails Okoronkwo, Ucheibe, as outstanding daughters of Abia
Summary: Abia State Governor, Alex Otti, hails Esther Okoronkwo and Christy Ucheibe for their outstanding contributions to Nigeria’s thrilling 3-2 victory over Morocco in the final of the 2025 Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), describing them as “outstanding daughters of Abia�

Title: BBNAIJA season 10: 15 females, 14 males begin journey to N150m grand prize
Summary: The host of the show, Ebuka Obi-Uchendu, introduced 14 male contestants . This year’s BBNAIJA season 10: 15 females, 14 males begin journey to N150m grand prize .

Title: Thailand, Cambodia agree ‘unconditional’ ceasefire
Summary: The announcement follows a mediation meeting at Anwar's official residence in Malaysia . Malaysia currently chairs the Association of Southeast Asian Nations . Thailand, Cambodia agree ‘unconditional’ ceasefire .

Title: China to offer childcare subsidies in bid to boost birth rate
Summary: China to offer childcare subsidies in bid to boost birth rate . "It provides direct cash subsidies to families across the country, helping to reduce the burden of raising children," it said .

Title: 2027 will be a different game – Ombugadu
Summary: Hon. David Emmanuel Ombugadu vowed that he and his party will fiercely protect the people’s mandate and resist any form of electoral manipulation . The former governorship candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Nasarawa State has vowed to fiercely protect his party's mandate .

Title: ANAMBRA GUBER: Set up transition committee  now, Obidike tells Soludo
Summary: Chief Hon. Obidike Chukwuebuka has called on Anambra State Governor, Prof. Charles Soludo, to set up a transition committee . He described the governor’s departure from office as inevitable .

Title: Iran rejects talks with West on ‘defence capabilities’
Summary: France called for a "comprehensive deal" with Tehran that covers its missile programme and regional influence . Iran said on Monday that its military capabilities were not up for negotiations .

Title: APGA celebrates Soludo at 65, hails transformative leadership
Summary: The All Progressives Grand Alliance has congratulated the Anambra State governor, Chukwuma Soludo, on his 65th birthday . The party described Soludo as a remarkable individual who has dedicated his life to public service and transformative leadership .

Title: JUST IN: Lagos APC members protest, demand chairman's removal
Summary: Members of the All Progressives Congress in Lagos are staging a protest at the Lagos State House of Assembly . They are demanding the removal of the party’s state chairman, Pastor Cornelius Ojelabi . The demonstration, which began earlier today, has drawn a significant security presence .

Title: England's remarkable Euro 2025 success a triumph for 'incredible' Wiegman
Summary: England beat Spain 3-1 on penalties to win Women's Euro 2025 title . They are the first England senior team, men's or women's, to lift a major trophy on foreign soil . The Lionesses came from behind against Spain to draw 1-1 after extra time before winning on penalties in Basel .

Title: PICTORIAL: Aisha Buhari, family relocate to ex-President's Kaduna residence
Summary: Aisha Buhari and her family have relocated from Daura in Katsina State to her late husband’s residence in Kaduna State . The residence, where the former president stayed before leaving Nigeria for medical treatment in London, is located at Ungwan Rimi GRA . The move marks the end of his low-profile

Title: Akwa Ibom approves recruitment of 3,000 civil servants
Summary: Akwa Ibom State Government has approved the recruitment of 3,000 qualified professionals into its Mainstream Civil Service . Recruitment cuts across a wide range of disciplines and cadres, including education, healthcare, engineering, law, agriculture, science, and administration . The recruitment process will be conducted exclusively through the state’s AR
